text: Juan Manuel Villa Guti√©rrez (26 September 1938 - 5 January 2025) was a Spanish footballer. He played as a midfielder. He played for the Spain national football team in 1964, making three appearances. He was born in Seville, Spain. Villa died on 5 January 2025 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Spanish footballers Category:People from Seville
title: Juan Manuel Villa
